item.title: Opinion Poll by Kantar for La Libre Belgique and RTBf, 16–29 January 2023 – Seating Plan Projection
item.description:
Seating plan projection for the Belgian Chamber
76 seats needed for a majority
Opinion poll by Kantar for La Libre Belgique and RTBf, 16–29 January 2023
